reviews.text:
A gem of San Marino gastronomy.

The food is simply delicious. It takes a while to arrive, but it's worth every second of the wait. The Bolognese pasta is a highlight. Simply divine.

Was a amazing food experience!
Pizza was fabulousâ€¦.
But the dessert was so goodâ€¦. ðŸ¥°
We started with one panna cota for the kidâ€¦.and eat 3 in a Table of 4 persons!
Tiramisu was also very nice.

They have nice pizza with fresh and tasty ingredients. I recommend the aubergine with cheese as an entry. The place is managed by very friendly people and I would dare to say that it's the only place in San Marino where I didn't feel treated like a wallet with legs.
I wish they could invest in nicer tableware and tables so they could have a more cozy/elegant place that matches their amazing service.

The food in this place is one of a kind! Very tasty, classic, amazing! Ravioli with eggplant are super! And the focaccia... The best focaccia, I've ever tried and I love bread! You should try it! The chef went to a special class for it and it's worth it! Trust me! Try it :)

Very welcoming staff, tasty and inventive dishes. The food is clearly made with care and attention. My steak needed some salt but that is personal taste, it was cooked to perfection. The pizzas on the other tables looked really good too. Recommend!
